climbs.name: Surprise Party
climbs.fa: Alex Charmoz, Todd Gordon, Tucker Tech, Susan Peplow, Tyler Gilson

content.description: Start on top of a block and follow the incut ramp up to a stance where a bolt can be clipped. Use the twin cracks and up some slab moves to a small hotizontal. Clip a bolt out left and trend left, either using the large knob or the face to it's left. Protect the large horizontal and follow a jagged crack up the face and around the bulge to a flake. Clip a piton and top out to a set of anchors up top.
content.protection: 2 bolts at the start make it a sane lead now. Cams up to #3. Finger size up top./
content.location: South face of Sunlight rock. 15 min approach from parking lot.

climbs.name: Dik Dik
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, Andrea Tomaszewski, Tucker Tech

content.description: A fun steep climb on positive holds makes this a fun route to do if in the area. Well-thought-out bolt placements that are not scary or overbolted. Pretty solid jugs.
content.protection: Three bolts (3/8"), natural anchor (sling a boulder) up top.
content.location: Located on the northwest side of Sunlight Rock, short boulder hopping and you're there. Walk off to climber's right.
